trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*> method, which allows <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> data to be custom filtered.
trans-unit.target: 公开<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*>方法，它允许<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>要自定义数据筛选。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The IDataPointFilter interface exposes the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method, which takes a specific data point within a series and returns a `Boolean` value that determines whether that data point will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: IDataPointFilter 接口公开<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>方法，它采用一系列内的特定数据点，并返回`Boolean`值，该值确定是否将筛选该数据点。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform custom filtering: - Derive a new or existing class from this interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行自定义筛选:-派生一个新的或现有的类，从此接口。

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method to provide the custom filtering logic.
trans-unit.target: -重写<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>方法以提供自定义筛选逻辑。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To initiate the filtering operation, call one of the `Filter` methods in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class that takes an IDataPointFilter object as its first parameter.
trans-unit.target: -若要启动筛选操作，调用之一`Filter`中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>采用 IDataPointFilter 对象作为其第一个参数的类。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: For sample source code, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例源代码，请参见<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a particular data point in the series will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否将筛选序列中的特定数据点。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called for each data point in a series, and returns a `Boolean` value indicating whether a data point should be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应该为在序列中，每个数据点调用并返回`Boolean`值，该值指示是否应筛选的数据点。

trans-unit.source: To provide custom filtering, derive a new or existing class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> interface and then implement this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供自定义筛选，新的或现有从派生类<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>接口，然后实现此方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>

trans-unit.source: Provide custom criteria matching logic, then return `true` or `false` to mark the data points to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 提供自定义的条件匹配逻辑，然后返回`true`或`false`来标记要筛选的数据点。

trans-unit.source: After this method has been implemented, use one of the `Filter` method definitions in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class that takes an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> object as a parameter to perform the filtering.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法后，使用之一`Filter`方法定义中的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>采用类<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>对象作为参数进行筛选。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: Filtered points, by default, are removed from a series.
trans-unit.target: 筛选的点，默认情况下，会从一系列。

trans-unit.source: They can also be displayed as empty points by setting the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它们也可以显示为空点的值设置<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: Filtered points can also be marked as filtered if they do not match filtering criteria, as determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>value.
trans-unit.target: 筛选的点也被标记为筛选如果它们不匹配的筛选条件，所确定的那样<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>值。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> object that the data point belongs to.
The index of the data point, which determines its position in the series.
trans-unit.target: 数据点，确定序列中的位置的索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the data point is removed, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果删除该数据点，否则<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
